Name: Die Fantastischen VR - Fantaventura
About the game: 'Fantaventura' is an extraordinary fantasy island in the middle of the ocean. The sun is burning as you walk the beach and encounter dancing plants, colourful animals, and floating soap bubbles. Mysteriously, you are stranded on this island with the legendary German rap group DIE FANTASTISCHEN VIER. In a hypnotic blend of volumetric video, animations, 360 video and interactive sound, their 1993 hit ' Tag am Meer ' (A Day at the Beach) becomes a new virtual reality. â€¨Relax, listen to the beats, and visit the worlds inside the bubbles by sticking your head in. Use the trigger on your controller to grab objects or to beam them towards you. Duration: up to 45 minutes.
